name: NSTextParagraph
desc: A class that represents a single paragraph backed by an attributed string as the contents.

items.name: init(attributedString: NSAttributedString?)
items.desc: Creates a new paragraph with the attributed string you provide.

items.name: var paragraphContentRange: NSTextRange?
items.desc: Returns the range of the paragraph in the attributed string.

items.name: var paragraphSeparatorRange: NSTextRange?
items.desc: Returns the range of the paragraph separator in the attributed string.
